name: Reilly
descriptions: Reilly is a member as well as the leader and founder of the mercenary band known as Reilly's Rangers encountered in the Capital Wasteland in Fallout 3.

The young Reilly grew up without her parents in the ruins of the former American capital Washington, D.C., instead being raised by an unnamed man with a military background who brought her up to be self-sufficient. Her adoptive parent died around 12 years later, with Reilly carrying his body to Arlington Cemetery for a proper military burial. Four years prior to 2277, at the age of 26, she founded a group dedicated to eradicating the threat of super mutants and geomapping the Capital Wasteland, naming them Reilly's Rangers.

Sometime shortly before the Lone Wanderer left Vault 101 in 2277, Reilly and the Rangers traveled to Vernon Square to map out the ruins, where they were ambushed by the infesting super mutants and eventually overpowered, forced to take shelter in the Statesman Hotel. Reilly herself attempted to escape solo to find help getting her group out of danger but ended up seriously wounded. She managed to evade the mutants' attacks, making it as far as the Museum of History where she was found by passing scavengers and brought to Doctor Barrows at the Chop Shop within Underworld, drifting in and out of consciousness.
Reilly appears in Fallout 3 and Fallout: Wasteland Warfare.

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: Well, I guess you weren't such a jerk after all.

topics.topic_text: Let me ask you about something else.
topics.response_text: Okay, go ahead.

topics.topic_text: How can I get there from Underworld?
topics.response_text: Your best bet is to stay with the Metro tunnels. Head north from here to Metro Central. Then look for the tunnels to the Dupont Circle Station.

topics.topic_text: Any good news about the area?
topics.response_text: Not much I'm afraid. Oh wait, the hospital may have some supplies that will help you.

topics.topic_text: I'm sorry Reilly... None of them made it. I did the best I could.
topics.response_text: I... I don't know what to say. I should never have left them up there. Maybe with one more gun, they could have made it.

topics.topic_text: I'm sorry we lost Brick.
topics.response_text: Yeah, that stupid gearhead. Sigh. Ah well, at least the others made it.

topics.topic_text: I'm sorry we lost Brick and Butcher.
topics.response_text: I was afraid that might happen. I should never have left them up there alone. Now their deaths rest on my shoulders.

topics.topic_text: I'm sorry we lost Brick and Donavan.
topics.response_text: I was afraid that might happen. I should never have left them up there alone. Now their deaths rest on my shoulders.

topics.topic_text: I'm sorry we lost Butcher.
topics.response_text: Yeah, Butcher was a good man. Ah well, at least the others made it.

topics.topic_text: I'm sorry we lost Butcher and Donavan.
topics.response_text: I was afraid that might happen. I should never have left them up there alone. Now their deaths rest on my shoulders.

topics.topic_text: I'm sorry we lost Donovan.
topics.response_text: Yeah, Donovan was a good man. Ah well, at least the others made it.

topics.topic_text: It went extremely well, as you can see. We didn't lose anyone.
topics.response_text: I'm very impressed at your skill. I don't think I've come across someone quite like you in the ruins.

topics.topic_text: Let's discuss something else.
topics.response_text: Sure thing.

topics.topic_text: I'm afraid I've lost my Geomapper...
topics.response_text: Like I told you last time, the last one I gave you was it. I am fresh out of them. Sorry.

topics.topic_text: We all make mistakes, Reilly. You're not a fortune teller.
topics.response_text: Yeah, but I led the guys right into a corner. Theo died because I decided to take shelter in the hospital.

topics.topic_text: It is what it is.
topics.response_text: Yeah, but I led the guys right into a corner. Theo died because I decided to take shelter in the hospital.

topics.topic_text: Shit happens, Reilly. Get used to it.
topics.response_text: Well a lot of shit happened all because of me.

topics.topic_text: No, Theo died because of bad luck. That's all.
topics.response_text: Thanks. You're sweet to try and make me feel better about everything.

topics.topic_text: Theo died because he was careless.
topics.response_text: He wasn't careless. I was the one who was careless. Bah, it doesn't matter why... either way, he's gone.

topics.topic_text: There's tremendous risk in what you do and I bet Theo knew that.
topics.response_text: Thanks. It's nice of you to try and make me feel better about everything.

topics.topic_text: Let me help. You stay here and I'll do some mapping for you.
topics.response_text: You'd risk your neck for me like that?

topics.topic_text: Well, I hope it all works out.
topics.response_text: Yeah. On my own as usual. Sigh.

topics.topic_text: Well, looks like you're on your own then.
topics.response_text: Yeah. On my own as usual. Sigh.

topics.topic_text: Sure. Why not. You look like you need the help.
topics.response_text: Well... okay. I hadn't expected this, but I'll certainly take you up on it. Oh, and I insist on paying you. I won't take no for an answer.

topics.topic_text: Well, yeah. I expect to be paid a merc's wage, though.
topics.response_text: Don't worry, I'll compensate you for your time.

topics.topic_text: Nah. I was just messing with ya.
topics.response_text: You are such an asshole.

topics.topic_text: Done deal. I'll locate as many as I can for you.
topics.response_text: Here, take this geomapper. Please don't lose it. Donovan spent a year developing it and I only have a few.

topics.topic_text: As long as the caps flow, you'll get your maps.
topics.response_text: Here, take this geomapper. Please don't lose it. Donovan spent a year developing it and I only have a few.

topics.topic_text: On second thought, I think I'll pass.
topics.response_text: Oh! Okay.

topics.topic_text: Have you had run-ins with them?
topics.response_text: Yeah, we've crossed paths. Fortunately, we just stepped out of each others way.

topics.topic_text: Well, wouldn't you kill if that was part of your contract?
topics.response_text: Look, those fucks went into a settlement a year or two ago and killed everyone. Women, children... everyone.

topics.topic_text: Sounds like my kind of people.
topics.response_text: If that's your kind of people, then you really need to take a long look at yourself and decide just what the hell is wrong with you.

topics.topic_text: What's been happening since you've been back?
topics.response_text: Well, I've been feeling a little more confident now that I have you mapping for us.

topics.topic_text: I have some mapping data for you.
topics.response_text: Excellent! Let me offload the data and I'll be glad to pay you.

topics.topic_text: What's the deal with Talon Company?
topics.response_text: Let me give you a word of advice. Stay away from them, they give mercs a bad name.

topics.topic_text: I have to be on my way.
topics.response_text: Good luck. You're going to need it.

topics.topic_text: How do I know they're still alive?
topics.response_text: Before I left I gave them an order to keep broadcasting for help over their radio.

topics.topic_text: Where is Theo's body?
topics.response_text: We lost him on one of the stairwells on the second floor of the Statesman Hotel.

topics.topic_text: I don't think you're in any condition to make threats.
topics.response_text: Look, I just woke up expecting to see the pearly gates. Can you cut me some slack, or what?

topics.topic_text: Okay, okay. Sorry.
topics.response_text: If time wasn't so precious right now, I wouldn't be so on edge either. I need to get help for the rest of the Rangers, and fast.

topics.topic_text: I don't cut anyone slack. Deal with it.
topics.response_text: Nice that you pick on bed-ridden people. That how you get your jollies? Does it make you feel tough?

topics.topic_text: Whoa, whoa. Calm down! Who are you?
topics.response_text: I'm sorry. The name's Reilly. Yeah, THE Reilly as in Reilly's Rangers.{accentuate THE}

topics.topic_text: Hey, relax, you were badly wounded. Now... who are you?
topics.response_text: I'm sorry. The name's Reilly. Yeah, THE Reilly as in Reilly's Rangers.{accentuate THE}

topics.topic_text: Get a grip, lady.
topics.response_text: Look, asshole. I don't know who you are, but no one talks to Reilly that way. Yeah, you heard me, THE Reilly of Reilly's Rangers.

topics.topic_text: I don't think you're in any condition to be up and about.
topics.response_text: That's not the way I do things.

topics.topic_text: My apologies. I didn't know who you were.
topics.response_text: That's okay, kid. Don't sweat it. The Wasteland's a big place.

topics.topic_text: Reilly's Rangers, huh? Never heard of you.
topics.response_text: You been stuck living in a vault the last decade or something?

topics.topic_text: I've heard of you guys. You pack some serious firepower.
topics.response_text: You're pretty sharp, kid.

topics.topic_text: Oh, not the mighty Reilly's Rangers! Oooh, scary...
topics.response_text: Laugh it up, kid. It's easy for you to make fun of me now when I'm in this condition.

topics.topic_text: So, what's this about needing help? Tell me the whole story.
topics.response_text: We were mapping the Vernon Square part of the downtown ruins and got jumped by a Super Mutant ambush party.

topics.topic_text: You look terrible. Maybe I shouldn't have woken you up so quickly.
topics.response_text: Heh, I feel worse than I look, but that doesn't even matter to me. I'm just worried about the rest of the Rangers.

topics.topic_text: Wow, Reilly. You look like shit.
topics.response_text: You got a lot of class, kid.{Sarcasm}

topics.topic_text: You've been in a coma... chances are the Rangers are already dead.
topics.response_text: No! There is no way my guys are dead!

topics.topic_text: Why don't you attempt a rescue? Your legs broken or something?
topics.response_text: Are you completely stupid?

topics.topic_text: Let me guess, more Super Mutants inside?
topics.response_text: You got it. More of the ugly bastards just kept coming. We fought our way to the roof and found a way across to the Statesman Hotel next door.

topics.topic_text: Not a very smart move, if you ask me.
topics.response_text: I didn't ask you. Those bastards were everywhere. I don't know what was driving them.

topics.topic_text: Bad move, I'm guessing.
topics.response_text: Very bad move, but we had no choice.

topics.topic_text: Trapped yourself at the top of a tall building. Brilliant.
topics.response_text: Look, I don't know what your problem is, but I got three guys alone out there with an army of Super Mutants around them.

topics.topic_text: Last stand?
topics.response_text: Last stand? Well, we hoped not. We figured we'd get up there and get a better signal to radio the Brotherhood of Steel for help.

topics.topic_text: Look, I could care less about your stories.
topics.response_text: Fine. Since you're all business and obviously don't give a damn about human life, I got a proposal for you.

topics.topic_text: So that leaves them up there. How come you're here?
topics.response_text: My bad idea I'm afraid. I had a Stealth Boy which allowed me to slip off the roof unnoticed. The plan was to get back to get some help.

topics.topic_text: Did you set any kinds of traps or mines?
topics.response_text: Actually, we did lay down a bunch of countermeasures. I don't know how many of them have already gone off though.

topics.topic_text: I don't know, Reilly. This sounds like suicide.
topics.response_text: Look, I don't know where else to go. In the shape I'm in, I'll be lucky to get ten feet.

topics.topic_text: What's in it for me if I risk my neck for you?
topics.response_text: Spoken like a merc. You sound like me when I was just a kid starting out in the business.

topics.topic_text: Forget it. I may as well shoot myself in the head and save the trouble.
topics.response_text: Wow. You really are an asshole. Fine. I hope their deaths sit well on your conscience.

topics.topic_text: Your team's still alive... I heard their distress signal!
topics.response_text: They are?! Holy shit!

topics.topic_text: Tell me what's going on and I'll see if I can help.
topics.response_text: We were mapping the Vernon Square part of the downtown ruins and got jumped by a Super Mutant ambush party.

topics.topic_text: Start from the beginning.
topics.response_text: We were mapping the Vernon Square part of the downtown ruins and got jumped by a Super Mutant ambush party.

topics.topic_text: Sorry, sounds like suicide. Be my guest.
topics.response_text: I dunno why you bothered to come here and wake me then. I would have been better off sleeping through it.

topics.topic_text: Nah. It was all in a day's work.
topics.response_text: You're a cocky little thing, aren't you? I like that.

topics.topic_text: Yeah. That was a tough run.
topics.response_text: I bet it was. Frankly, I'm amazed you made it.

topics.topic_text: Are you kidding me? Hell would have been a damn picnic!
topics.response_text: All right, all right. No need to get your underpants in a knot.

topics.topic_text: No, please continue... Your men are more important than my reward.
topics.response_text: Losing a bit of the merc edge, eh? Don't get soft on me now!

topics.topic_text: Yeah, please. I have much to do.
topics.response_text: Okay, but at least let me thank you for all you've done. You could have been killed trying to save my men.

topics.topic_text: You're damn right I do!
topics.response_text: Now you sound like a merc! Well, let's cut the bullshit and get right to it then.

topics.topic_text: What about my reward?
topics.response_text: Reward? If you had some sort of a deal going with Butcher, then that was between you and him.

topics.topic_text: Hey, what about my damn reward?
topics.response_text: Are you out of your fucking mind? Reward? If you had some sort of a deal going with Butcher, then that was between you and him.

topics.topic_text: Before we talk about that, do you have my reward?
topics.response_text: Wow. You sound like one of the guys from Talon Company. Ruthless bastard, aren't you?

topics.topic_text: Let's skip all the story and get to the point. What do you need?
topics.response_text: So you're that eager to jump in headfirst, eh? You remind me a lot of some crazy mercs I knew back in the day.

topics.topic_text: Sorry about being such a jerk, Reilly.
topics.response_text: It takes a big man to apologize... I respect that.

topics.topic_text: I'm not going to bug you anymore.
topics.response_text: If time wasn't so precious right now, I wouldn't be so on edge either. I need to get help for the rest of the Rangers, and fast.

topics.topic_text: You don't scare me.
topics.response_text: Wow, you're really an asshole... you know that?

topics.topic_text: What did you need from me?
topics.response_text: Get the Rangers home. Please. That's all I want. I don't care how you do it.

topics.topic_text: I need some time to think about it.
topics.response_text: What's to think about? Sigh.

topics.topic_text: All right. I'll do it.
topics.response_text: Whew, I was holding my breath on that one I think. I wasn't sure what you were going to say.

topics.topic_text: I'll go for the armor.
topics.response_text: The armor it is. Wear it with pride, kid. We do.

topics.topic_text: The Minigun is more my speed.
topics.response_text: You got it. Use it well, and take down some more Muties with it for us.

topics.topic_text: Got anything else?
topics.response_text: Sorry, we need every piece of equipment we've got. I can spare the gun and the armor, but that's about it.

topics.topic_text: Not long, fortunately.
topics.response_text: Right... can't remember what I was doing.

topics.topic_text: What difference does it make?
topics.response_text: Well, I don't know actually. Kind of confused.

topics.topic_text: Oh, it's been centuries. The planet is a lush, green paradise once again.
topics.response_text: Huh? What the hell are you talking about? That isn't very funny.

topics.topic_text: Can you think of anything that will help me get there?
topics.response_text: We have a headquarters not far from here.

topics.topic_text: What can you tell me about Vernon Square?
topics.response_text: If I wasn't asking for your help, I'd tell you to stay away. It's thick with Super Mutants. I don't know why.

topics.topic_text: How did this all happen, Reilly?
topics.response_text: We were mapping the Vernon Square part of the downtown ruins and got jumped by a Super Mutant ambush party.

topics.topic_text: Tell me more about Reilly's Rangers.
topics.response_text: There's five of us... oh wait, four now. I almost forgot about Theo. Poor bastard.

topics.topic_text: SpeechChallengeFailure
topics.response_text: I've told you everything I can think of.

conversation.response_text: Watch yourself, those ruins are bad ass.
Please give me a status report.
